001package net.tvburger.jdl.mlp;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetworks;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers.NeuralNetworkInitializer;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers.XavierInitializer;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers.StochasticGradientDescent;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.Activations;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Objectives;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
015import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
016
017import java.util.Arrays;
018
019public class MLPLineMain {
020
021    public static void main(String[] args) {
022        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<Float> line = SyntheticDataSets.line(0.0f, 1.0f, JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
023        line.setNoiseScale(0.0f);
024        DataSet<Float> dataSet = line.load();
025        DataSet<Float> trainingSet = dataSet.subset(10, dataSet.size());
026        DataSet<Float> testSet = dataSet.subset(0, 10);
027
028        MultiLayerPerceptron mlp = MultiLayerPerceptron.create(Activations.linear(), Activations.linear(), 1, 1);
029
030        NeuralNetworkInitializer initializer = new XavierInitializer();
031        ObjectiveFunction objective = Objectives.mSE();
032        StochasticGradientDescent<MultiLayerPerceptron> gradientDescent = new StochasticGradientDescent<>();
033        gradientDescent.setLearningRate(0.1f);
034        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.dumpNodes().epochs(5).reportObjective().batch();
035        Trainer<MultiLayerPerceptron> mlpTrainer = Trainer.of(initializer, objective, gradientDescent, regime);
036        mlpTrainer.train(mlp, trainingSet);
037
038        NeuralNetworks.dump(mlp);
039
040        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : testSet) {
041            Float[] estimate = mlp.estimate(sample.features());
042            System.out.println("real = " + Arrays.toString(sample.targetOutputs()) + " vs estimated = " + Arrays.toString(estimate) + " | features " + Arrays.toString(sample.features()));
043        }
044    }
045}
